title: Design Toscano Heraldic Royal Lions Coat of Arms Wall Sculpture
features: HERALDIC COAT OF ARMS continues a rich heritage with a pair of lion-headed mythological beasts flanking a lion shield and the majestic crown of the royal family.
ROYAL BLAZON OF ARMS have adorned crest, tapestry, sculptures and the designs of royals since Medieval times.
CAST IN QUALITY DESIGNER RESIN and painstakingly hand painted in antique gold against a field of sea mist green.
AVAILABLE ONLY AT DESIGN TOSCANO, our Medieval decor work of decorative wall art is sculpture with a proud European history.
Our historical coat of arm for your walls measures 3.5"Wx2.5"Dx22.5"H and weighs 12 lbs.
description: This royal blazon of arms features a pair of lion-headed mythological beasts flanking a lion shield and the majestic crown of the royal family. Though coats of arms continue to evolve as dynasties merge, this classic, 2-1/2-foot-wide wall sculpture continues a rich heritage, cast in quality designer resin and painstakingly hand-painted in antique gold against a field of sea mist green. 30½ "Wx2½ "Dx22½ "H. 12 lbs.
